summary: A base class that provides default behavior when running tests in an assembly. It groups the tests by test collection, and then runs the individual test collections.

content.value: public abstract class TestAssemblyRunner<TContext, TTestAssembly, TTestCollection, TTestCase> where TContext : TestAssemblyRunnerContext<TTestAssembly, TTestCase> where TTestAssembly : class, ITestAssembly where TTestCollection : class, ITestCollection where TTestCase : class, ITestCase
